page.title: 18INDUSTRY AROUND OLDCOTES
page.content: In{Oldcotes}there is a{wood yard}which makes pit props for{local pits.}In {Oldcotes}there is a{coach operator}who promotes holidays and trips for schools.There is a{garage}where you can buy petrol and have car repairs done.There is a{garden centre}that sells green houses and crazy paving stones. There is{Wayside Water Gardens which sells everything to do with making a garden pool eg. pool liners, fibreglass pools,plants,fish, filters to keep pool water clear, fountains and ornaments. There is a{boarding {kennels}in{Oldcotes}to look after your pets if you go on holiday.There is a farm that sells eggs and{farm produce. There is one more{coach firm}that buys and sells{coaches.Letwell and Firbeck {have no industry for most of it}is used for farming.Most of{Langold}is commercial, people working in shops.
